name: WarmeeSkills
0:
”Alexa open warm me”
”Alexa tell warm me to turn on both sides”
”Alexa tell warm me to turn heat off”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: warm me
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask Alexa to manage heat levels and duration of your warmee heating blankets, throws, and mattress pads.

Warmee is an innovation-driven company on a mission to bring comfort and warmth to your home. Our products are modern, design-forward, and super soft electric blankets. This skill will allow you to control blankets you have registered with your account. If you have done this stage please download our Warmee app on Google Play or the App Store on Apple and first connect with your blanket. 

Once you have registered a blanket please invoke account linking with Alexa by saying Alexa open warm me.

This will send an account linking invitation to your Alexa app. Once you have linked Alexa with your Warmee account you will now have full control over your electric blanket from controlling heat to duration of heating.
